about.title: About
about.description:
We all know that situation when you arrive at the dining hall and realize you should have eaten at home. This has happened to us many times, and that's why we decided to fix it 😼

On Transat, you'll find the dining hall menu updated daily, but that's not all!
No more endless waiting at the laundry room for your machine to finish, get notified when your machine is done 🔔

We are Plug'IMT and we're determined to create an app made by students, for students 🐙

New features will be added throughout the year to make Transat an essential part of the Nantes IMT campus 🥳

We hope this app will save you as much as it saved us while we were developing it 🫶

welcome.subtitle: 由亚特兰蒂斯人创作，为亚特兰蒂斯人服务 🐙

traq.title: Traq'
traq.about: 🍺 Traq（Traquenard）是一家学生酒吧，在这里您可以品尝到各种饮料。
traq.additionalInfo: 在活动期间，可能会出售射击游戏或鸡尾酒。请查看活动页面了解更多信息。
traq.openingHours:
Traq 在所有派对和特别活动期间开放。 

如果您口渴了，而 Traq 已关闭，您可以通过 WhatsApp 要求 BDE 打开。

restaurant.title: 菜单

closedNight.title: 餐厅已关闭
closedNight.description: 请于上午 11 时返回查看今天的菜单

restaurant.about: API 每天都会准备新鲜的自制菜肴，就连水果沙拉也不例外！午餐和晚餐的菜单每天更换。
restaurant.price: 前菜、主菜和甜点的价格为 3.95 欧元。
restaurant.additionalInfo: 您可以将开胃菜换成甜点。如需额外收费，还可提供其他菜肴。还饿吗？问问服务员吧！晚餐 7:45 后，加餐免费。

washingMachine.title: 洗衣房
washingMachine.almostDoneBody: 您的 {{type}} 将在 {{minutes}} 分钟内完成
washingMachine.getNotificationDesc: 您将在 {{type}} 结束前收到通知 {{minutes}} 分钟
washingMachine.about: 洗衣房全天候开放，您可以随时清洗和烘干衣物。衣物快洗完时，您会收到通知，并实时查看洗衣机的可用性。
washingMachine.price: 洗涤：2 欧元，烘干：1 欧元。
washingMachine.additionalInfo: 使用硬币、银行卡或 Monix 钱包支付（建议用于奖金和退款）。需要更多烘干时间？在开始前支付多个疗程的费用。
